page_content: In November 2018 the City Councillors and Mayor declared a Climate Emergency. The mayor has also developed a [climate emergency action plan](https://www.bristol.gov.uk/documents/20182/33379/Mayor%27s+Climate+Emergency+Action+Plan+2019+FINAL). More recently a [One city climate strategy](https://www.bristolonecity.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/one-city-climate-strategy.pdf) has also been released.
